name: Animal Labyrinth
description:
Welcome to Animal Labyrinth!

This is new free arcade game.
Animal Labyrinth is only of its kind maze path way finding game.

You must find exit in random generated maze. You play as a cartoon animal lost in neverending labyrinth, and you must help little animal find exit. You increase your score by surviving mazes. The further you go the bigger becomes labyrinth size. 
Collect coins and bonuses to increase animal chance to survive in next maze.

Don't let the gost find you and damage your flame. Try to survive!
Don't let big ghost to eat you! 

Control: (Very simple)
- Drag anywhere on screen to move your character.

The game includes 
-Challenging mazes
-Many Different and colorful mazes
-8 Playable characters (Cat, Rabbit, Frog, Penguin, Mouse, Deer, Bear and Pig)
-4 Stats that player can upgrade(Light time, move speed, luck, shield work time)
-7 Different types of gosts
-Collectable coins
-Colorful cartoon graphic
-Easy to learn gameplay
-Easy and comfortable controls
-Further you go, the bigger maze becomes.
-Unical ambiet soundtrack
-Cool sound effects
-Relaxing gameplay

Animal labyrinth is free to play. So be first and get the best score in this game.Use your brain and plan your way in Animal Labyrinth!
